mdRecord.dcterms:title: Answer?: ballad : for alto or baritone, with cornet obligato ad lib / music by Alfred G. Robyn ; words selected
Could you but read, my love this heart of mine
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Robyn, A. G. (Alfred George), 1860-1935 [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: For alto or baritone and piano, with cornet obligato (ad lib.). [original]
At foot of t.p lithograph: "Am-Eng. Co." [original]

Advertisements: On verso of title page, excerpts from She's the prettiest girl I know, Dream one dream of me, and Manzanillo : danza mexicana; on p. [7]: Fulfilled : ballad / by Alfred G. Robyn; on p. [8]: "Thematic catalogue of popular ballads by A.G. Robyn ..." [original]
At head of title: "Respectfully inscribed to Miss Margaret Lackland, St. Lous, Mo." [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Songs (Low voice) with piano
Popular music--United States--To 1901
